long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Hypercatcher ChapterSync Extension unifies the chapter creation experience across all major podcasting platforms. Create your podcast chapters using any tool like studio.hypercatcher.com to create your chapters and drop them into any supported podcast hosting platform.
